title: Verify: Implement Code Node with Sandboxing
description:
Run automated tests for task T-058.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement Code Node to execute Python or JavaScript code in a sandboxed subprocess with timeout and resource limits. Ensure no filesystem access beyond /tmp.
Criteria:
- Code Node executes code in sandboxed subprocess
- Timeout and resource limits enforced
- No unauthorized filesystem access
acceptance_criteria: Code Node executes code in sandboxed subprocess
